verbs.description: [ARG0: A Kim Jong Un lookalike] [V: said] [ARG1: he was detained and questioned upon his arrival in Singapore on Friday , days before a summit between the North Korean leader and U.S. President Donald Trump] .
A Kim Jong Un lookalike said he [V: was] detained and questioned upon his arrival in Singapore on Friday , days before a summit between the North Korean leader and U.S. President Donald Trump .

A Kim Jong Un lookalike said [ARG1: he] was [V: detained] and questioned [ARGM-TMP: upon his arrival in Singapore on Friday , days before a summit between the North Korean leader and U.S. President Donald Trump] .

A Kim Jong Un lookalike said [ARG1: he] was detained and [V: questioned] [ARGM-TMP: upon his arrival in Singapore on Friday , days before a summit between the North Korean leader and U.S. President Donald Trump] .
